name: REDEEM Your GROUPON
description: All you have to do is EMAIL US! HOW TO REDEEM: 1. Prepare to email info@cityloveshirts.com - with a few pieces of info. 2. In the email, give us your NAME -- Groupon Number -- the STYLE and SIZE shirt you want. We will verify on our list. Do not try to buy a product and enter a code at checkout. Just Email us. 3. Don't forget the MAILING ADDRESS. Shipping is included to you, or someone you love. There are no auto-repsonses. We will process all order in 2-5 days, and you will receive an CONFIRMATION email when it has shipped. *Do not buy this product. *Do not email us to say your code did not work.

name: David Over Delaware - Sky Blue Cotton
description: Original Illustration by Daniel Maritato for CityLove. Don't forget to checkout the BACK! Regular Retail Price $22.50 This piece is available in S, M, L, XL while supplies last. This style is sized in JUNIORS - If you normally alternate between two sizes, go with the larger one for this particular style. You will love its softness! We ship shirt orders within 2-3 days using First Class Mail with the United States Postal Service. Make CityLove part of your next birthday gift or special occasion. CityLove Buffalo works closely with another small business, Steamroller Press, to print all of our apparel in downtown Buffalo.

name: BUFFALO BRAVES - Grey Track Shirt
description: A BUFFALO ORIGINAL! For the Ol' Skool Buffalo Sports Fan in You! CityLove Buffalo only uses the highest quality fabrics for our Buffalo shirts. This is a modern, slimmer fitting tee with good length, stretch, and unmatched comfort. Wear with pride. Regular Retail Price: $29.50 This SUPER-SOFT "Vintage" Tee is pre-shrunk, and is not 100% cotton. It is a tri-blend Track Tee from American Apparel. We have available SMALL--MED--LG--XL while supplies last. We ship shirt orders within 2-3 days using First Class Mail with the United States Postal Service. Make CityLove part of your next birthday gift or special occasion. CityLove Buffalo works closely with another small business, Steamroller Press, to print all of our apparel in downtown Buffalo. We have also created over (70) custom projects for local groups, we can do the same for you.
